effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.

flavor_text.x_y: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply.
